page.title: 16TOURISM
page.content: {HOTELS.}The Polmark, at Harlyn, a small residential hotel, with outdoor swimming pool, putting green and restaurant; and the Harlyn Inn, having bars, carvery restaurant, and self- catering flats and bungalows for rent. At the Harlyn is also a Take-Away Food Bar and Shop. {CARAVAN SITES.}Mother Ivey's, 250 static caravans, 150-200 tourers and tents. Site has private beaches, play area and shop, toilets and showers. Harlyn Bay has 300 static caravans, 150-200 tourers and tents, plus two fields for private rallies or groups. Club House offers live entertainment, Disco and shop. Management say improvements are planned, including new toilets and shower block, and swimming pool.
